title: Best of WWDTM July 2021
description: WWDTM presents some favorite segments to remind everyone what shows with actual audiences sound like, with Leslie Odom, Jr., Regina King, and Laird Hamilton. We also feature some moments with our panelists, some of which have not been aired before.

itunes:title: Best of WWDTM July 2021
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: We remind everyone about shows with audiences and guests like Leslie Odom, Jr., Regina King, and Laird Hamilton. Plus our panelists have a little fun.
itunes:subtitle: We remind everyone about shows with audiences and guests like Leslie Odom, Jr., Regina King, and Laird Hamilton. Plus our panelists have a little fun.
